data.name: Battlerite - Ultimate Fan Pack
data.detailed_description:
Are you a dedicated Fan of Battlerite? Want to support us further? Purchase the Ultimate Fan Pack!

This pack will reward you with some unique cosmetics and account bonuses that will truly make you stand out from the crowd!

  • Legendary "Goblin Throne" Mount
  • “Hero of the Arena” Icon attached to your name and avatar
  • Type in Golden Text instead of Vanilla when chatting
  • Permanent +10% Champion XP boost for you and anyone you play with or against. This bonus stacks with other players that have unlocked the Ultimate Fan Pack
  • 5 Gold Chests containing three cosmetic items each. Each chest guarantees at least one epic quality item
  • Patch 0.8 Update - Legendary "Battle Wolf" Mount

This pack will reward you with some unique cosmetics and account bonuses that will truly make you stand out from the crowd!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
